Blog.post: haixzxxz.........wad e hell man!!!im so...angry....i juz dun wan to go to grandma place...my fone got confiscated and everything...how to survive siax..its so damn bloody bored man...den maths..my fucking hw...want to get it done but dunno how to do...my maths so poor..it suckx lorx...haixzxxz.....i rather everything gone...why muz sch reopen siax...suckxx man!!!....den he went to changi mac wif his frenx do mathx...suckx man..fucker...

school reopening tmr le lehx...haiyoyo...i miss him so damn much though we seen each other during np camp but we seldom talk and that hurts me alot...den must do maths hw but noone teach me..what the hell man!!its all driving me mad....

that day when i go his hse, he told me.."if we are still together next yr,it'll affect his post of having been a future president in npcc"..i was taken aback by his words..wad he meant by that way..does he have doubt that we wont be together till next yr but wait...didnt he promise and told me over and over again last yr when we stead that we could last...is this another promise that he's going to break again?? im so confused~~mY parents are giving me a headache??i couldnt cope wif so many matters~~studies...im aiming for B class but look at my standard, look at my grades, look at my attitude towards my work..i keep day-dream in class~~im at lost~~i cried at his hse, on e table, on his pillow while he practised his guitar..lovely wasn it??~~so sad..so quiet~~im troubled~~y did everything perfect have to turn out this way~~i wan to cry out aloud~~damn loud~~im hurting~~haixzxzx~~im independent(like real)~~i wan back my huikiat~~haixzxz~~i wan back ever of my fren(trusted one)~~haixzxzx~~am i a fool??~~am i dreaming?? is this nitazmare gonna end~~i feel so bad to those i hurt to..i didnt mean to hurt any of them~~im serious!!!im so bad mehx but i know im flirt!!~~lolx...cant help it bax~~though i really wan to try to kick away this habit~~nowsaday..i feel numbed alot..damn numbed till i wont feel jealous at all...hahaha~~i feel like letting huikiat go~~but i dun bear...how could i waste our goin to nine-mths relationship down e drain..wouldn my love be wasted...~~i wan to go back to e past..e very first time isaw him...he walked me home..he told me secrets..and he accept me as his godsis..u noe how delighted i feel~~it was powerful...hahaxz...he was so cutex...ohmygod...~~den on our first date(formally)i was sick but i didnt turn down e offer by him..he brought tissue for me...wasnt that lovely..how could i not love him at all!!!~~~though it hurts me dat he still luvs his ex...i nv failed to make him known my presence...i wan him to notice me...know that heres joycelyn here...hahaxz...giving him countless of advice..lolx~~haiyoyo...den jealously pour in and evrything~~but its over le..~~haixzxzx~~i juz love him alot~~i love huikiat alot alot~~haizzxxxz...

today in class..e guy who sat beside me,lungfu..told me many many things today..he told me that i change..he said..last time no matter who ever hate me or make bad comment bout me, i'll ignore and still stay cheerful as ever but this week, i changed into someone very cold..if i hate that person, i'll gif him a black face..guess i really change le..and he also told me bout weiting(a guy who lurve me for one yr plus, waiting for me, willing to sacrifice evrytin jux for me,stay with me late late bout 2plus in e morning[midnitax] without caring who will scold him[loving ritex] but he's not my stead..haixzx..e person i love is huikiat...haixzxz...den lungfu asked me..who really lurve me btw them..if u wan me say e truth..in my heart..yes..weiting treat me better cause i tink lahx..maybe cause huikiat is my stead den he tink dun really need to worry that i'll be gone den dun need to treasure me more cause im his alrady wad..haiyoyo..wad am i trying to say..but weiting not..he's not my stead so he's trying hard to catch my attention, make me know his presence and might change my impression..haixxz..that's e difference btw having a stead and someone whose chasing me(im not boasting around but im hurt)..now weiting wants to leave me..maybe i should let him go in order for him not to get hurt by me anymore but i dun bear..haixzx..i cried in class because of that.. i day-dream all e way throughout all my lesson..kena scolded by mr yao(chinese cher) also..haixzx..den go toilet wash face den saw huiting...came to know she and sayhai also broke up cause of rubgy..haixzx...den after sch...huikiat sent me home..we quite silence de..so sad and heartache siax..haixzxz..we sat at our hse stairs..haixz..bout 2.55 to 4.14..we stayed dere..at first i dun wana hug him..i keep forcing..but he's too strong..i still struggled but later on gave in..i still love him deeply..i cant jux let go of him so easily..haixzx..okay we hugged..den he looked at me while i also look at him back..den i take e first move to kiss him..haixzx...i felt that..it was e very last kiss im gonna give him..somehow precious at that moment and HEART DAMN PAIN..when we kissed halfway..i jux cant stand it..i cried..how could i cried while kissing ..but i jux did..haixzx..den i jux hugged him damn tight....hiaxzx...dunno why...i keep saying im strong, brave but its not true at all..haixzxz...i jux lurve huikiat alot...too deep..haixzx...den he went home...haixzxz...i feel like dying le..haixxz...how it feels to have someone close to u...someone like huikiat like weiting like lungfu gone..haixzxz....maybe i shu=ould learn how to live and carry on life....

WiLl we geT bacK togEthEr oR brEak aGaiN..haiXz..wad happen to us...why mux it be me who spoilt us..why mux u avoid me..why mux u make me cry..u feel happy is it...why is it that its lie this...why..haixzxz...why...why u wanna hackcare me.. maybe i dun wanna heed tamidzi, arif and dave words le..i feel like jumping off my building and everything is settle..i know its stupid but i jux cant help with it..noone trust me..so why do u still stay beside me..make me love u even more..haixzx...why..haixzx

today early in e morning i was awaken by a call from rashidah asking me to join e maraton competition(np) at pasir ris carpark c..lolx..i agreed later on upon hearing she's e only sec2 gal goin...hehex...it was damn tiring man..later we found out when we reach dere dat only two sec one's are running wif us..ohmygod...it was relay..each of us has to run bout 2 or more km.. we position each other according as rashidah(1) clore(2) li chin(3) joycelyn(4)..rashidah tried hard and make it first and clore maintain her position also..but lichin..she lack...bout 3rd and more position...den all hope was on me now..i of course pessurize.. den reihan ran wif me..accomin me all e way..lolx...he helped me pick my shoes which i dropped halfway..and took e water for me..so sweet of him..hahax..haiyoyo..den i tink got stomach cramps ..den my feet got bubble..hahaxz...but its fun man...den later on...i went to huikiat's aunt place also at pasir ris..den he got this cousin..so cutex..six-yr old called shawn..at first he scared of me den later on he stick glue to me..so cutex...whoa...den he asked me to go to his grandma place when i was taking a lift from his aunt..hehex...shawn and i click alot..den huikiat only can smile dere...haha...lolx...so happy siax..promise to take him out one day..mux keep my promise de...hehex...haiyoyo...
